posts.post_content:
Posted By: Lee
Offered here is a really nice N172 Jerry Denny Old Judge, GAI 3. This card may be graded by GAI, but I believe they got it right on this one, a definite candidate for a crossover. There are no creases, only a few fine wrinkles on the back, no writing or paperloss, no aleration of any kind. The image is strong. Only minor edge and corner wear, which is consistant with a 4. The price is $230, scans are below. Please e-mail me with any questions or to buy the card.

Thanks,
Lee H
